The brand FORTESSA® reflects a singular goal: to deliver quality dinnerware, flatware and glass accessories to culinary professionals and at-home chefs. FORTESSA® is a flagship brand of the U.S. based company Fortessa Tableware Solutions (FTS) that is part of the Zwiesel Fortessa Group.
